summary: A letter from WilmerHale attorneys to the U.S. Attorney's Office responding to grand jury subpoenas issued to JPMorgan Chase regarding accounts linked to Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell. The letter transmits financial records and requests confidential treatment of the produced materials under FOIA exemptions.

persons.name: Anjan Sahni
persons.context: WilmerHale attorney who authored the letter on behalf of JPMorgan Chase, requesting confidential treatment for the produced financial records.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Subject of the grand jury investigation; financial records for accounts related to him are being produced by JPMorgan Chase.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of the grand jury investigation; financial records for accounts related to her are being produced by JPMorgan Chase.

connections.description: Both are subjects of the same grand jury subpoenas seeking their financial records from JPMorgan Chase, indicating a joint investigation into their financial activities.
Sahni is an attorney at WilmerHale representing JPMorgan Chase in responding to grand jury subpoenas and requesting confidential treatment for produced documents.

events.title: Grand Jury Subpoenas Issued to JPMorgan Entities
events.description: Grand jury subpoenas were issued to JPMorgan Chase Bank N.A., Chase Bank USA, N.A., and J.P. Morgan Securities LLC.

events.title: Additional Grand Jury Subpoena to JP Morgan Chase
events.description: A grand jury subpoena was issued to JP Morgan Chase.

events.title: Additional Grand Jury Subpoena to JP Morgan Chase
events.description: A grand jury subpoena was issued to JP Morgan Chase.

events.title: Document Production and Confidentiality Request
events.description: WilmerHale, on behalf of JPMorgan Chase, produces financial records in response to subpoenas and formally requests confidential treatment under FOIA.

locations: One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
7 World Trade Center, 250 Greenwich Street, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: JPMorgan Chase produced financial records for specific account numbers linked to Jeffrey Epstein (accounts 739110438 and 739470663) and Ghislaine Maxwell (accounts 739116312, 3149920008, and 2916490721).

The production includes Excel files showing wire activity for these accounts and instances where Epstein or Maxwell's names appear in wire transactions involving JPMorgan, including correspondent bank transactions.
The law firm WilmerHale requested confidential treatment for all produced materials under FOIA Exemptions 4 and 7, citing potential competitive harm and the investigatory nature of the records.
The document indicates an ongoing grand jury investigation into the financial activities of Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell as of November 2019.
